# Quarto Document with Code Chunks

## Basic R Chunk

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: true
x <- 1 + 1
print(x)
```

## Chunk with Figure Options

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "A nice plot"
#| fig-width: 7
#| fig-height: 5
plot(1:10, main="Test")
```

## Chunk with Label and Mixed Options

```{r, cache=my_cache_var}
#| label: analysis-chunk
#| echo: false
#| message: true
# This has a complex expression that stays inline
result <- analyze_data()
```

## Chunk with label

```{r}
#| label: mylabel
#| echo: false
summary(data)
```
